# Welcome to the Bioconductor Community {#community}

The Bioconductor community comprises users and developers, and the goal of the mentorship programme is to make the transition from user to developer as smooth and enjoyable as possible.

A number of platforms are available for community members to interact with each other:

- [Slack](https://bioc-community.herokuapp.com/)
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Bioconductor)
- [Bioconductor Support Site](https://support.bioconductor.org/)

Teaching materials and resources are also available to learn abou the Bioconductor project:

- [The Bioconductor project (Carpentries lesson, in development)](https://carpentries-incubator.github.io/bioc-project/)
- [Modern Statistics for Modern Biology](https://www.huber.embl.de/msmb/course_spring_2020/index.html)
